Package uk.ac.rhul.cs2800

package uk.ac.rhul.cs2800
  • Class
    Description
    BadTypeException
    BadTypeException class, used when types do not match for getters.
    CalcController
    This class deals with adding the observers and setting the answer.
    CalcModel
    This class will create the required calculator depending on which type the user wants.
    Calculator
    A simple interface to allow each calculator to evaluate an expression.
    CalcView
    The CalcView class that is filled by the fxml loader.
    Driver
    The main class of the calculator.
    Entry
    Entry class that will handle processing inputs.
    InvalidExpressionException
    Exception created to handle if the expression is valid or not.
    NumStack
    NumStack class created as a facade class of Stack.
    NumStackTest
     
    Observer
    A functional interface that we can then use to name an observer notification, This class was inspired by MVC-Seperated code by Dave Cohen.
    OpStack
    Class that will handle how operations are pushed onto the stack.
    OpType
    Simple enum to establish what expression type the user has selected.
    RevPolishCalc
    This class handles the way to evaluate postfix expressions.
    Stack
    This is a stack class that will 'stack' a list of entries.
    StandardCalc
    This class will handle Infix evaluations of the calculator.
    StrStack
    StrStack class which will handle how strings enter the stack.
    StrStackTest
     
    Symbol
    A simple enum to store special characters that will never change.
    Type
    A simple enum to store the types of entries in the stack.
    ViewInterface
    This interface controls how we link to the calculator, this class was inspired by MVC-Seperated and MVCJavaFX code by Dave Cohen.
